title: Get 40% Bonus GTA$ on Qualifying Shark Cards
headline: Get 40% Bonus GTA$ on Qualifying Shark Cards
subtitle: Offer Ends on January 7
content:
Take advantage of the special offer you claimed for 40% bonus GTA$ on qualifying Shark Cards.

Purchase a Great White, Whale, or Megalodon Shark Card to receive 40% bonus GTA$, and use your newfound resources to help secure a lavish new mansion property, part of the new A Safehouse in the Hills update for GTA Online.

Offer ends on January 7 at 11:59 p.m. ET. One redemption per each type of qualifying Shark Card. Bonus GTA$ will be delivered within 72 hours of purchasing.
